name: World of Mixed Martial Arts 5
summary: In WMMA5, you run your own MMA organization in a lively, vivid, competitive game world that evolves over time. Play with companies, fighters, and teams from all around the globe. WMMA5 contains an ultra-powerful fight simulator, giving you a blow-by-blow account of each bout. Deal with contracts, morale, promotional work, hype and more.
